Yet Another Cookiecutter Python Template¶

A full featured Cookiecutter Python project template bundled with a nice shell script that will definitely make your life easier.

Features¶

  • Poetry - Packaging and dependency manager.

  • Pytest - Functional testing for applications and libraries.

  • Coverage.py - Code coverage reports.

  • Tox - Automated testing within virtualenvs.

  • Flake8 - PEP 8 code style enforcement.

  • Shpinx - Documentation generator compatible with ReadTheDocs.

Coming soon…
